description: Aaron J. Montes, a reporter for El Paso Inc., submits a request to the Office of the Attorney General of Texas to release information related to the city of El Paso's Multi-purpose Performing Arts and Entertainment Center project, including contracts and property purchases, citing the public's right to know how their tax money is being spent.
